name: Osprey Duro 1.5 Vest Pack - Men's
description: Run through the mountains carrying only your essentials. Bounce-free stability holds your water, snacks and race-day gear comfortably in place, with a dedicated compartment for the included hydration reservoir to make your aid station stops a breeze.Breathable airmesh back panel keeps things airy.Body Wrap harness wraps your chest for a comfortable fit.Hydration compartment for included Hydraulics® 1.5L reservoir.Magnetic clip keeps bite valve tethered.Multiple stretch pockets hold snacks or extra flasks.Trekking pole storage attachments.
